ACEDMIC PROJECT 
Hydraulic Turbine Based on Pelton Wheel:- 
Pelton turbine (wheel) is use to convert hydraulic energy in to mechanical energy followed by electrical 
energy. 
Pelton turbines (wheel) are suitable for power extraction, when the water energy is available at high 
head and low flow rate. Pelton turbine is most efficient at this condition. Thus, more power power can 
be extracted from a water source with high pressure and low flow than from a source with low pressure 
and high flow, even when the two flows theoretically contain the same power. Pelton wheels are made 
in all sizes.

2. GSA Metals: GSA Metals is the engineering and manufacturing enterprise in India in the 
automobile sector today. GSA Metals is manufacturing various pressed parts and molding parts.
